name: forgy-platform
description: Plataforma Forgy - App de Ejercicios con Prisma ORM

scripts.prisma:migrate: cd forgy_backend_api && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json forgy_backend_api/node_modules forgy_backend_api/package-lock.json forgy_backend_api/dist forgy_mobile_app/node_modules forgy_mobile_app/package-lock.json forgy_admin_web/node_modules forgy_admin_web/package-lock.json
scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently "cd forgy_backend_api && npm install" "cd forgy_mobile_app && npm install" "cd forgy_admin_web && npm install"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:start && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
